library(PubmedPlot)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)

# a <- PubmedPlot::search_term_by_year('"Mendelian randomisation" [Title] OR "Mendelian randomization" [Title]', 2003:2005)
a <- PubmedPlot::search_term_by_year('"Mendelian randomisation" [Title] OR "Mendelian randomization" [Title]', 2003:lubridate::year(Sys.Date()))
